title: Exxon’s Stock Hits First Record High in Eight Years
sub_head: Sharp gain this year for oil company’s shares coincides with surge in crude prices
body:
Exxon Mobil Corp. shares notched their first record close since 2014, another milestone in a blockbuster year for energy stocks.
The oil giant’s stock gained 1.2% to close at $104.59, topping its previous closing high from June 23, 2014. The shares have gained 71% this year and 8.9% in June alone.
